name: musiclake
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: music lake
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Music Lake Radio provides a mood-altering experience, guiding listeners into deep relaxation with sweet downtempo music, tender synths, and cleverly composed cosmic chill-out 

To enjoy this tranquil auditory journey, simply enable the Music Lake Radio skill on your Alexa-enabled device. Once activated, say, "Alexa, play Music Lake" to start streaming say the word "Play" or "Start streaming". 

You can also Pause the stream by saying "Alexa, Pause" 

In order to terminate the stream, make sure to use the trigger words "Close the Stream" or "End Music Lake"

Please ensure your device is connected to the internet. This skill is available to users worldwide without any regional restrictions. No additional hardware or account setup is required. Experience the serene sounds of Music Lake Radio and let the music transport you to a place of calm and relaxation.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
